modShortDescription: Can now be toggled on/off light a normal light and can be picked up if inside your land claim. Included signs: Open, Gun, Pizza, Bowling and Chinese Food.
modDescription:
Updated for A19.5! Can now be toggled on/off light a normal [light](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-lights/) and can be picked up if inside your land claim.

## Included Signs

* Open x 3
* Gun
* Pizza
* Bowling
* Chinese Food

**Demo:**

Just reusing the old demo for now, Three08 will do a new video with all the signs in it when he get the chance.

This is a DMT mod. So requires [DMT Modding Tool](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/13037-dmt-modding-tool/).

**[Download](https://www.mediafire.com/file/n8tny1ksa19hw6e/NeonSignsv1.0.7.zip/file)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/24834-neon-signs/).

**Credits:** [Three08](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/three08/)
